definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: ) (NH Hithp. despair of, [[יֵאוּשׁ]] desperation; Aram. Pa. [[יׇאֵשׁ]], etc., make despair (so Targum Ec 2:20); Ar. yay’isa despair)—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְנוֹאַש]] consec. 1Sa 27:1; Pt. [[נוֹאָשׁ]] Je 2:25 + 3 t.;—despair, [[מִמֶּנִּי שָׁאוּל]] ´[[וְנ]] [[לְבַקְּשֵׁנִי]] 1Sa 27:1 and Saul shall despair of me, to seek me; pt. desperate, despairing, of Job, Job 6:26; elsewh. [[נוֹאָָשׁ]] (foll. [[אמר]]) desperate! = there is no hope! Je 2:25, Je 18:12, Is 57:10.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Inf. [[לְיַאֵשׁ]] [[אֶת־לִבִּי עַל כָּל־הֶעָמָל]] Ec 2:20 to make my heart despair, concerning all the toil.
